headline: Federal Realty Misses Q4 FFO Estimates, Guides Higher for 2026
summary: FRT lags Q4 FFO estimates but posts strong leasing, higher occupancy and upbeat 2026 guidance, signaling continued momentum despite the FFO slip.

headline: A Look At Kimco Realty (KIM) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Why Kimco Realty is on investors’ radar today Kimco Realty (KIM) has drawn attention after a recent share price move, with the stock closing at $22.32 and showing positive returns over the past month and past 3 months. Investors are weighing this performance against its current fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Kimco Realty. headline: Evercore ISI Group Maintains In-Line on Kimco Realty, Raises Price Target to $24
summary: Evercore ISI Group  analyst Steve Sakwa   maintains Kimco Realty (NYSE:KIM) with a In-Line and raises the price target from $23 to $24.

headline: Kimco Realty Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Kimco Realty (NYSE:KIM) used its fourth-quarter earnings call to outline what management described as a “banner year” in 2025, highlighted by record leasing milestones, improving occupancy, and growth in funds from operations.
